904120.name: RPG Maker MV - Modern Music Mega-Pack
904120.description:
Club-beat combat, blues riffs, abandoned subways and city streets are the setting for the music in this pack. Set the stage for urban assaults or smooth sailing in today's world with these 25 tracks, 25 music events, and 25 SFX! Composer Joel Steudler wants you along for the ride as you cruise through the modern day!

Features:

- 25 BGM tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, themes, and towns!
- 25 useful music events (MEs) that are great for transtions or short moments that need an extra touch!
- 25 SFX fit for present-day settings
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

Tracklist:

Battle - Boss You Around
Battle - Club Thumper
Battle - Counter-insurgency
Battle - Hard Hitter
Battle - Party Crashers
Battle - Urgent Encounter
Dungeon - Maximum Security
Dungeon - Psych Ward
Dungeon - Sewer Crawler
Dungeon - Spooky Subway
Dungeon - Tactical Strike
Dungeon - Wrong Way Street
Theme - Blues Man
Theme - Crime Lord
Theme - Elegant Underworld
Theme - Good Memories
Theme - Retro Time
Theme - Smooth Mover
Theme - Will to Chill
Town - Alone In A Crowd
Town - Downtown Lights
Town - Mean Streets
Town - Mystery Boulevard
Town - Urban Knights
Town - VIP Lounge
904120.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
